importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Prince Andrew stepped back from royal duties in 2019 due to scrutiny over his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein.
Prince Andrew was stripped of royal patronages and military titles in 2022 over allegations of involvement with Jeffrey Epstein.
Prince Andrew settled a lawsuit with Virginia Giuffre in 2022, following claims of a sexual relationship.
On October 17, 2025, Prince Andrew officially announced he is dropping his Duke of York title in response to ongoing accusations.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The period from 2019 to 2022 saw a significant escalation in public scrutiny of Prince Andrew's ties to Jeffrey Epstein, leading to loss of honors and a public retraction from royal duties.

keyTakeAways: Prince Andrew has formally relinquished his title of Duke of York and associated honors in a statement from Buckingham Palace, citing that continued accusations distract from King Charles's work.
The decision follows new revelations from a posthumous memoir by Virginia Giuffre, who claims she had a sexual relationship with Prince Andrew when she was 17.
Prince Andrew denies all allegations and maintains that he is not involved in any wrongdoing.
The announcement also affects Sarah Ferguson, who will lose her title of Duchess of York as a result of the family's collective decision.
Andrew remains a prince and is expected to continue residing near Windsor Castle, while his daughters retain their princess titles.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Prince Andrew has officially stepped down from using his title of Duke of York and associated honors, citing that ongoing accusations related to his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein distract from the duties of King Charles. The decision follows new revelations from a posthumous memoir by Virginia Giuffre, who claims to have had a sexual relationship with Andrew when she was 17, though he denies the allegations. Andrew was previously stripped of royal patronages and military titles in 2022 and stepped back from royal duties in 2019. The announcement also impacts Sarah Ferguson, who will lose her title of Duchess of York. While Andrew remains a prince and continues to reside near Windsor Castle, his daughters retain their princess titles.
title: Prince Andrew drops Duke of York title as Epstein fallout continues
